page.title: 11EMPLOYMENT AROUND BYFIELD
page.content: WE FOUND OUT WHAT JOBS PEOPLE DO.A FEW SAID THAT THEY SOLD THINGS LIKE FARMING FOOD OR CAR EQUIPMENT.QUITE A LOT OF PEOPLE WORK IN AN OFFICE E.G.SECRETARY .A COUPLE OF PEOPLE NEEDED TO BE SKILLED FOR THEIR JOB E.G.ELECTRICIAN.SOME PEOPLE WORK PART-TIME AND A FEW PEOPLE DO MANUAL WORK .SOME SAID THAT IF MORE FACTORES WERE BUILT IT WOULD MEAN MORE WORK.IF THE GOVERMENT WERE CHANGED AND WE MADE PEOPLE WORK LESS HOURS THEN UNEMPLOYED PEOPLE COULD WORK THE HOURS. WE ASKED SOME PEOPLE IF THEY THOUGHT THEIR JOB WOULD BE THE SAME IN THE FUTURE .THE MAJORITY SAID YES.MOST PEOPLE WORK OUTSIDE THE VILLAGES.THE ONES WHO DO WORK INSIDE THE VILLAGES ARE MOSTLY FARMING PEOPLE.THE AVERAGE COMMUTING DISTANCE IS BETWEEN 10 AND 20 MILES TO SURROUNDING TOWNS.
